backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining file, note, folder, mission, and user profile types with storage, authorization, and health/diagnostic query methods plus internal counters and maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two speech‑to‑text deduplication features to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all major frontend components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation establishing a new Draft fully synced with Live version 114, outlining verification steps, parity checks, and baseline rules.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for theming, including light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, and loads the React app.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change‑freeze notice prohibiting code changes after restoring Live v114 until explicit user approval, with allowed documentation‑only updates.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, network‑first fetching, and runtime caching.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist confirming full restoration of frontend to match Live v114, covering authentication, components, styling, hooks, and behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring providers and showing HomePage with an optional intro overlay based on auth state.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing detailed error messages, actions, and diagnostics for actor initialization failures.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Renders an animated SVG target-style gallery icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Displays a fixed subtle bottom line decorative element.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a file cannot be opened externally, offering retry and download options.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog that previews files by type, provides open, download, move, and delete actions, and handles confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: UI for uploading files, adding links, and creating notes with speech‑to‑text, including progress tracking and validation.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens folder-related UI with a styled folder icon.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated modal for listing, creating, renaming, and deleting folders with swipe actions and confirmations.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen folder management view supporting creation, renaming, deletion, and selection with swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full-screen file viewer with swipe navigation, download, delete, share, and move-to-folder/mission actions.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Renders a gallery of files and notes with selection, long‑press, viewing, sharing, and folder/mission move dialogs. Includes touch handling, file-type icons, and viewer logic.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the top app header with theme toggle, authentication menu, and progress bar. Shows a gallery icon and sign‑out option when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows a brief animated splash screen that fades out and triggers a completion callback. Uses timers to control visibility and animation timing.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: A dialog shown when a link fails to open, offering retry and copy‑to‑clipboard options. Displays the blocked URL and uses toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a button to sign in using Internet Identity and shows a loading spinner during authentication. Handles login initiation and disabled state.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission detail view with title editing, tasks, attached files/notes, and autosave. Supports opening viewers, external links, and syncing task changes.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating a new mission with title and task list management. Handles task creation, toggling, removal, and mission submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions interface, with animated icon and hover effects. Supports disabled and overlay‑adjusted rendering modes.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen mission list with swipe actions, filtering by completion, and mission creation/deletion handling.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper layout that constrains content to a mobile-only container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for moving files or notes into a selected mission with loading and success handling.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog to view, download, share, or delete a note, with optional actions to send it to folders or missions.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files or notes into folders or back to the main collection, with performance logging.
Swipeable row component exposing edit and delete actions with drag handling and animations.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Global upload progress bar showing total upload progress and item count.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Shows a centered welcome screen with a target-themed SVG graphic and introductory text plus a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Manages backend actor initialization with retries, error handling, and identity-based lifecycle control.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Tracks upload batches, progress updates, and provides methods to start and complete file, link, and note uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Prefetches folders, files, missions, and notes once when the actor becomes ready to speed up home page loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout handling using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer to differentiate touch from mouse input.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Implements a debounced autosave hook for mission title and tasks with change detection, mission switching resets, and queued saves.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating missions with backend actor integration and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for creating, retrieving, moving, and deleting notes, with cache invalidation for notes, folders, and missions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes React Query hooks for fetching and managing files and folders, including paginated retrieval and folder creation with concurrency‑limited uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements a speech‑to‑text hook using Web Speech API with continuous recognition, interim/final transcript handling, and deduplication.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup plus extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, including notes and missions color schemes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a cn() helper combining clsx and tailwind-merge for merging class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen logic handling authentication, actor status, data fetching, UI state, and optional dev smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines actor initialization error messages and functions to classify IC-related initialization and token errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Utilities for opening URLs, downloading files or notes, and sharing content via the Web Share API.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Rules determining how a file should open based on MIME category, including viewer, download, or office preview.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes files by MIME type and provides helper functions for previewability and human-readable labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Computes mission progress, checks mission completion, and splits missions into completed vs incomplete.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Compares two task arrays safely with BigInt task IDs to detect equality.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Provides a lightweight performance logging utility that times operations when enabled via localStorage or URL params.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Adds helpers to inspect React Query mission cache state and log delete mutation lifecycle events.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs a backend smoke test covering folder creation, mission creation, file upload, and list verifications, returning step-by-step results.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Implements a simple promise concurrency limiter to control parallel async operations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Offers utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend UI.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical list of all frontend files defining the v114 baseline used for drift detection and future draft synchronization.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, known issues, and feature requirements for fixing duplicate words in microphone dictation.
